org.orgName: The District Court of the United States, Western District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: COURT OF THE KING'S BENCH OF SASKATCHEWAN.

I, Malcolm Dingwall, Acting Deputy Attorney-General in and for the Province of Saskatchewan, at the City of Regina in the said Province, do hereby certify that the copy of the Information and Complaint, the copies of the Warrants to Apprehend, and the copy of the depositions have been examined and compared with the originals thereof, and I find them to be true copies of the original Information and Complaint, the original Warrants to Apprehend, and the original Depositions, as aforesaid.

I further hereby certify that the depositions of Frederick A. McEwan, William James Henry Vigors, Cassius M. Clay Robinson and Charles Burdette Robinson, taken before Alexander Joseph Gordon MacEchen, Esquire, a Justice of the Peace in and for the Province of Saskatchewan, have been examined by me and taken in conjunction with the Delcarations of Frederick John Charles Edwards, Esquire, Acting Deputy Provincial Secretary of the said Province of Saskatchewan, and the Declaration of John William McLeod, Esquire, Clerk of the Executive Council of the said Province of Saskatchewan, and my own affidavits as to the law in form in this Province, herewith enclosed, would be acceptable as evidence in Extradition matters in the Province of Saskatchewan.
IN WITNESS WHEREOF I hereunto sign my name this twelfth day of August in the year of Our Lord One Thousand Nine Hundred and Twenty-One.
Acting Deputy Attorney-General for the Province of Saskatchewan Dominion of Canada.
